parameter.name: Application Path
parameter.description: Full site path where you would like to install your application (i.e., Default Web Site/Content)
parameter.defaultValue: Default Web Site/Content

parameter.name: Core DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Core database.

parameter.name: Core DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Core database.

parameter.name: Master DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Master database.

parameter.name: Master DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Master database.

parameter.name: Web DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Web database.

parameter.name: Web DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Web database.

parameter.name: Reporting DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Reporting database.

parameter.name: Reporting DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Reporting database.

parameter.name: XDB Reference Data DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you XDB Reference Data database

parameter.name: XDB Reference Data DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you XDB Reference Data database

parameter.name: Experience Forms DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you Experience Forms database

parameter.name: Experience Forms DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you Experience Forms database

parameter.name: EXM Master DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access you EXM Master database

parameter.name: EXM Master DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access you EXM Master database

parameter.name: Marketing Automation DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access your Marketing Automation database

parameter.name: Marketing Automation DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access your Marketing Automation database

parameter.name: Processing Pools DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access your Processing Pools database

parameter.name: Processing Pools DB User Password
parameter.description: Password to access your Processing Pools database

parameter.name: Processing Tasks DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access your Processing Tasks database

parameter.description: Password to access your Processing Tasks database

parameter.name: Messaging DB User Name
parameter.description: User name to access your Messaging database

parameter.description: Password to access your Messaging database

parameter.name: Core Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to Import the Dacpac and Create DB User in Core Databse
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Core DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Master Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to Import the Dacpac and Create DB User in Master Databse
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Master DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Web Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to Import the Dacpac and Create DB User in Web Databse
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Web DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Experience Forms Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in Experience Forms database
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Experience Forms DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: EXM Master Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to import the dacpac and create user in EXM Master database
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={EXM Master DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Reporting Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to Import the Dacpac and Create DB User in Reporting Databse
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Reporting DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Processing Tasks Admin Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to Import the Dacpac and Create DB User in Processing tasks Database
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Processing Tasks DB Name};User ID={Database Admin User Name};Password={Database Admin User Password}

parameter.name: Master Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to enter into config

parameter.name: XDB Reference Data Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your XDB Reference Data database
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={XDB Reference Data DB Name};User ID={XDB Reference Data DB User Name};Password={XDB Reference Data DB User Password}

parameter.name: Experience Forms Connection String
parameter.description: Connection string to connect to your Experience Forms database
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source={Database Server Name};Initial Catalog={Experience Forms DB Name};User ID={Experience Forms DB User Name};Password={Experience Forms DB User Password}

parameter.name: XConnect Server Certificate Validation Thumbprint
parameter.description: XConnect Server Certificate Validation Thumbprint

parameter.name: XConnect Collection Certificate
parameter.description: XConnect Collection Certificate
parameter.defaultValue: StoreName=My;StoreLocation=LocalMachine;FindType=FindByThumbprint;FindValue={XConnect Server Certificate Validation Thumbprint}

parameter.name: XDB Reference Data Client Certificate
parameter.description: XDB Reference Data Client Certificate
parameter.defaultValue: StoreName=My;StoreLocation=LocalMachine;FindType=FindByThumbprint;FindValue={XConnect Server Certificate Validation Thumbprint}

parameter.name: XDB MA Reporting Client Certificate
parameter.description: XDB MA Reporting Client Certificate
parameter.defaultValue: StoreName=My;StoreLocation=LocalMachine;FindType=FindByThumbprint;FindValue={XConnect Server Certificate Validation Thumbprint}

parameter.name: XDB MA Ops Client Certificate
parameter.description: XDB MA Ops Client Certificate
